translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I submit to Your Lordship Gomes Porto, Justice of the Peace of Santa Maria, the enclosed ordinance. By Your Lordship's official letter.

The ordinance and the same official letter conclusively show who are the influential ones, and almost all have been pardoned by the government. To the Most Excellent Bento Manuel and to Your Lordship.

Since they fall under the custody of Your Lordship Gomes Porto in the attached official letter, Your Lordship, February 5 of the current year, because almost all have been prisoners and pardoned, and find themselves in the circumstances marked by the same decree.

God preserve Your Lordship  
Secretary of War Affairs in Caçapava, December 19, 1839.  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Answered on the 22nd of the current month.
